%%{CloudNative_DockerImage}}}%%
gantt
    title FastMemo Development Roadmap
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM
    axisFormat  %b %Y

    section Done
    Kanban Board Notes           :done, kanban, 2024-10, 2024-12
    Desktop Release (CloudNative_K8sCluster)      :done, desktop, 2024-12, 2025-01

    section In Progress
    TypeScript Migration         :active, ts, 2025-01, 2025-03

    section Planned
    Optimization                 :optimization, 2025-03, 2025-05
    Code Notes                   :code, 2025-05, 2025-07
    PostgreSQL Support           :postgres, 2025-05, 2025-07
    Canvas Notes                 :canvas, 2025-07, 2025-09

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 CloudNative_K8sCluster 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_K8sCluster'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

extra.repo_description: Memo application for Mobile, Tablets and Desktop, made in React Native using Expo. Possibility to create rich-text and checklist notes, reorganize them in categories, do Cloud Sync with your own Fireb
